title: [UPDATE] Company Of Heroes 2 Digital Collector's Edition (Update
description:
Information
Game: Company of Heroes 2 Digital Collector's Edition 
Version: v3.0.0.9704 (Update 2)
Supported Languages: Russian , English, German, French, Italian, Spanish, Polish, Czech 
* Language of the game switches from "Language Selector.exe".
Protection: Steam + CEG + StarForce 
Tablet: Is Present (RELOADED)

Change Logs (Updated 28 June 2013)

Gameplay
X Fixed Commanders Being not available in ToW missions.

Presentation
X 227 Order cinematic audio fix.
X [Oka River Winter] - Removed 2 Neutral Combat Engineers near the West Point Fuel.

Balance
X Balance changes from last week that didn't make it into Day Zero.

Reload Times: 
- German Howitzer Barrage reduced from 90 to 85 seconds. 
- Panzerwerfer Barrage reduced from 60 to 48 seconds. 
- Soviet Howitzer Barrage Increased from 90 to 120 seconds. 
- SU-76 Barrage increased from 60 to 80 seconds. 
- Sector Artillery Increased from 60 to 136.

Halftrack Flame 251: 
- Burst Duration reduced from 4 to 3 seconds. 
- Reload Duration Increased from 0.5 to 3 seconds.

SU-76 Barrage Weapon: 
- Damage Decreased from 120 to 80 Updates for June 26th , 2013 General.
- Improved Stability Campaign - Fixed bug Causing game to exit after Playing any mission.
- Addressed issue where people Download Would more than expected after install Disk.

Installation
- Install the game.
- Install this update. 
- Copy the contents of the folder Crack in a folder with a game.
- Play.
